The first 12 pages of this tome tell the same story in two languages: 6 pages in [Skald](/Languages.aspx?ID=42) and 6 pages in the ancient [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8) dialect used by saumen kar, a species of ice-dwelling [humanoids](/Traits.aspx?ID=91). The story is a tale of a saumen kar stricken with snow blindness after spending too long under the sun building snow giants.
